aboutText: Imagine a place where rules are different. Where rage is energy, and breaking is liberation.
aboutDescription: Smash Studio is a place where you can break things and relieve stress. It's a fun experience that allows you to relax and enjoy. Come alone or with friends and experience something different!
step1Desc: Before you start, you get protective gear to ensure your safety during the experience.
step2Desc: You can safely store all personal belongings in a locked locker.
step3Desc: Enter a specially prepared room where you can freely smash objects.
step4Desc: Feel relief and enjoy the unique experience of stress relief!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: Smash Studio is a creative and unique space where you can safely smash objects, release stress, and have fun. We offer unforgettable smashing experiences!
faq.question2: Can I record or take photos?
faq.answer2: Of course! We also offer the option to buy a photo taken with an Instax camera or footage from our security camera.
faq.question3: Can I buy additional smashable items?
faq.answer3: Yes, you can buy additional items on-site if you want to extend or enhance your smashing experience.
faq.question4: Can I organize a birthday party or team building event?
faq.answer4: Yes! Smash Studio offers special packages for birthdays, team buildings, and other celebrations.
faq.answer5: The minimum age is 15 years old with parental supervision, or 18 years old without supervision.
faq.answer6: Wear comfortable clothes, preferably sporty or casual. We recommend bringing an extra set of clothes just in case!
faq.question7: Can I play my own music?
faq.answer7: Yes! There is a phone inside the room that you can use to play anything you want through Spotify, YouTube, or any other app.
